about_the_game:
Get ready to embark on a journey into the bottomless pit of "Facility 079", an intense horror experience that challenges your bravery to its fullest limit.

About the Game:

"Facility 079" sends you on a journey to an abandoned research facility full of secrets and terrible discoveries. Armed only with a flashlight, you dare to face the dangers. You must find the Horton Genetics Server deep down in the bunker in order to obtain the research data that will change the fate of humankind.

• Find the saving data

You recieve a Call from the CEO of Horton Genetics, who immediately tells you about the required data and the ongoing thread of the well known and feared "Pherson Virus".

• Explore the facility

With every step deeper into the underground research facility, you discover what was actually being researched there and encounter the gruesome results up close. Use your creativity to progress through the various obstacles this giant underground facility has to offer. But as you do so, keep in mind that the dark corridors not only conceal dark secrets, but also living evidence. And they are not necessarily friendly to visitors.

• Save humanity

The fate of the world depends on your actions. Will you manage to achieve your goal? And will you make it out alive? It's in your hands.

Story:

After an uneasy sleep, 30-year-old logistics worker Aiden Stoner receives a call from his boss, alerting him to a critical situation. A virus called PhersonVirus, which has been spreading for the past 2 years, is mutating rapidly. Horton Genetics is close to finding a cure, but they need Aiden to retrieve vital research data stored in the old, abandoned Facility 079.

With the old servers without power and the lab locked down, the only option left is to access Facility 079 and upload the research data manually. Aidens boss, Mr. Anderson insists that Aiden is the one and only right person to retrieve the data. Although Aiden knows that the bunker was not only decommissioned but outright abandoned for reasons not fully explained in official records. Nonetheless, he still enters the research bunker buried 600 meters underground.

With the fate of humanity in mind, Aiden sets out for the most important night shift of his life to secure the data and face whatever else might be left behind underground. It’s up to you whether this mission will be his last.

Gameplay:

Facility 079 is a story-based horror game that features an open world map which can be explored by the player, drivable vehicles, a fictional in game Operating System, a variety of puzzles, lots of scary creatures and jumpscares. The main focus lies on the unsettling atmosphere, provided through immersive soundscapes and dark visuals.

The game features multiple endings, which are based on player made decisions throughout the gameplay.

Dev Note:

As our First UE5 game we give our best to deliver our story in a authentic way and provide a flawless gaming experience!

When we started developing games in 2017, we never thought that we would be able to create a game in that extent.

We hope you will have a blast playing our Horror experience and we look forward to provide more game titles for you!

ReHoGa Team

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Installing the Game on a SSD is hardly reommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 3070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Installing the Game on a SSD is hardly reommended

short_description: Explore the winding corridors of research Facility 079 in this first-person Horror Adventure game as you guide logistics employee Aiden Stoner through the abandoned bunker's hazardous depths on a search for critical data that holds the key to avert the impending disaster.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
